#summary How to set up netbeans to display the javadoc for the wpi libraries.
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

Explains how to set up netbeans to display javadoc.

= Details =

1) Click on the _Attach Javadoc_ button. To get to this button, type in one of the wpi methods (ex: jag.setX()). As this is being types, a pop-up box should open. The button should be in the pop-up box.
2) Navigate to the _supspotfrc_ folder.
3) Inside this folder, double click on the _doc_ folder.
4) Inside this folder, single click on the _javadoc_ folder and press on the attach javadoc button.
